data.trans: Trong lúc đó, trong lúc ấy
data.trans_hint: Bác sĩ sẽ gặp lại bạn vào tuần tới. Trong khi đó, bạn phải nghỉ ngơi càng nhiều càng tốt.
data.en_hint: The doctor will see you again next week. Meanwhile, you must rest as much as possible.
data.content_game_1: The doctor will see you again next week. meanwhile, you must rest as much as possible.
data.answer_en_hint: The doctor will see you again next week. meanwhile, you must rest as much as possible.

data.trans: Mặc dù vậy, tuy thế nhưng
data.trans_hint: Tin tức có thể là bất ngờ, tuy nhiên đó là sự thật.
data.en_hint: The news may be unexpected, nevertheless it is true.
data.content_game_1: The news may be unexpected, nevertheless it is true.
data.answer_en_hint: The news may be unexpected, nevertheless it is true.

data.trans: Tương tự thế, giống vậy, cũng
data.trans_hint: Hãy tưới nước cho những cái cây này 2 lần 1 tuần, và những cây trong phòng ngủ cũng giống vậy.
data.en_hint: Just water these plants twice a week, and likewise the ones in the bedroom.
data.content_game_1: Just water these plants twice a week, and likewise the ones in the bedroom.
data.answer_en_hint: Just water these plants twice a week, and likewise the ones in the bedroom.

data.trans: Nhưng trái lại, trong khi mà
data.trans_hint: Hệ thống cũ khá phức tạp trong khi hệ thống mới thực sự rất đơn giản.
data.en_hint: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
data.content_game_1: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
data.answer_en_hint: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.

data.trans: Nếu không thì, trái lại, mặt khác
data.trans_hint: Đóng cửa sổ, nếu không trong nay sẽ rất lạnh.
data.en_hint: Shut the window, otherwise it'll get too cold in here.
data.content_game_1: Shut the window, otherwise it'll get too cold in here.
data.answer_en_hint: Shut the window, otherwise it'll get too cold in here.

data.trans: Miễn là, chỉ cần, với điều kiện là
data.trans_hint: Bạn có thể dùng điện thoại của tôi miễn là bạn dùng cẩn thận.
data.en_hint: You can use my smartphone as long as you use it carefully.
data.content_game_1: You can use my smartphone as long as you use it carefully.
data.answer_en_hint: You can use my smartphone as long as you use it carefully.

data.trans_hint: Bệnh viện có một máy phát điện dự phòng trong trường hợp mất điện.
data.en_hint: The hospital has a backup generator in case there is a power failure.
data.content_game_1: The hospital has a backup generator in case there is a power failure.
data.answer_en_hint: The hospital has a backup generator in case there is a power failure.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không muốn đến đó, hơn nữa, tôi không có thời gian để làm như vậy.
data.en_hint: I don't want to go there, furthermore, I have no time to do so.
data.content_game_1: I don't want to go there, furthermore, I have no time to do so.
data.answer_en_hint: I don't want to go there, furthermore, I have no time to do so.

data.trans_hint: Bạn sẽ làm gì, ví dụ, nếu bạn phát hiện một nhân viên ăn cắp?
data.en_hint: What would you do, for instance, if you found a member of staff stealing?
data.content_game_1: What would you do, for instance, if you found a member of staff stealing?
data.answer_en_hint: What would you do, for instance, if you found a member of staff stealing?

data.trans_hint: Theo như người phát ngôn của công ty, doanh nghiệp đang kì vọng có doanh thu hơn 3,5 tỷ đô la trong năm nay.
data.en_hint: According to a company spokesman, the firm is expected to have sales of more than $3.5 billion this year.
data.content_game_1: according to a company spokesman, the firm is expected to have sales of more than $3.5 billion this year.
data.answer_en_hint: according to a company spokesman, the firm is expected to have sales of more than $3.5 billion this year.
